communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all contracts, communications, and agreements as well as contract dissolution, related to the City of Reno's partnership with the bike and electric scooter share start up, Lime. I am interested in all contracts and agreements between January 2018 and January 2020. This includes (but is not limited to):

• all contracts (as well as associated amendments, attachments, and exhibits)
• the Dockless Bike Share System Franchise Agreement with Lime
• cease and desist letter against Lime
• insurance agreements
• any emails sent between January 1, 2019 and March 20, 2019 to Lime's Director of Strategic Development Jonathan Hopkins by government officials 
• any emails sent between January 1, 2019 and March 20, 2019 to Lime's Senior Director of Data Policy and Strategic Partnerships Gabriel Scheer by government officials

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Kent

title: Reno e-scooter policies, data sharing agreements, applications, impound logs

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Reno e-scooter policies, data sharing agreements, applications, impound logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following documents relating to the operation of electric scooter (e-scooter) sharing systems within your city:

- copies of regulations, policies, or ordinances governing the operation of e-scooters and/or e-scooter shares within city limits, on a permanent or pilot basis
- applications or requests by electronic scooter companies to operate within city limits, including all attachments, submitted between January 1st, 2018 and the date this request is fulfilled
- data sharing agreements between the city and any past or present e-scooter operators in effect between January 1, 2018 and the date this request is fulfilled
- impound lists, logs, or registers of electric scooters impounded by the city

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Kent
